title: Cash Cobain Announces North American Headlining Tour, Shares Video for “Sick N Tired”: Watch
description: The New York rapper’s Party With Slizzy Tour will take him across the U.S. and Canada this fall
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The New York rapper’s Party With Slizzy Tour will take him across the U.S. and Canada this fall
text: Cash Cobain has announced his first-ever headlining tour. The 22-stop Party With Slizzy Tour will take the New York rapper and producer across the U.S. and Canada this fall, kicking off September 7 at Pier 17 in New York City. Scroll down to see the full list of dates.Cash Cobain put out the full-length Play Cash Cobain in 2024. This year he’s dropped the single “Trippin on a Yacht,” featuring Bay Swag and Rob49, and the OnlyHeaven collab “Sick N Tired,” which has a new music video out today directed by Sebastian Buendia. Watch it below.Read about Cash Cobain and Bay Swag’s “Fisherrr” at No. 17 on “The 100 Best Songs of 2024.”Cash Cobain:09-07 New York, NY - Pier 1709-09 Washington, D.C. - The Howard Theatre09-10 Norfolk, VA - The NorVa09-11 Charlotte, NC - The Underground09-12 Atlanta, GA - Center Stage09-14 Houston, TX - Warehouse Live09-15 Dallas, TX - The Echo09-17 Phoenix, AZ - Walter Studios09-18 Los Angeles, CA - Echoplex09-19 San Diego, CA - House of Blues09-20 Las Vegas, NV - AREA1509-22 Seattle, WA - The Showbox09-24 San Francisco, CA - The Fillmore09-25 Sacramento, CA - Ace of Spades09-28 Denver, CO - Cervantes’ Masterpiece Ballroom09-30 Minneapolis, MN - Varsity Theater10-01 Milwaukee, WI - The Rave II10-02 Chicago, IL - Avondale Music Hall10-04 Detroit, MI - The Majestic Theatre10-05 Toronto, Ontario - The Phoenix Concert Theatre10-07 Montreal, Quebec - Club Soda10-08 Philadelphia, PA - Brooklyn Bowl10-09 New Haven, CT - Toad’s PlaceAll products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Cash Cobain has announced his first-ever headlining tour. The 22-stop Party With Slizzy Tour will take the New York rapper and producer across the U.S. and Canada this fall, kicking off September 7 at Pier 17 in New York City. Scroll down to see the full list of dates.

Cash Cobain put out the full-length Play Cash Cobain in 2024. This year he’s dropped the single “Trippin on a Yacht,” featuring Bay Swag and Rob49, and the OnlyHeaven collab “Sick N Tired,” which has a new music video out today directed by Sebastian Buendia. Watch it below.

Read about Cash Cobain and Bay Swag’s “Fisherrr” at No. 17 on “The 100 Best Songs of 2024.”

Cash Cobain:

09-07 New York, NY - Pier 17
09-09 Washington, D.C. - The Howard Theatre
09-10 Norfolk, VA - The NorVa
09-11 Charlotte, NC - The Underground
09-12 Atlanta, GA - Center Stage
09-14 Houston, TX - Warehouse Live
09-15 Dallas, TX - The Echo
09-17 Phoenix, AZ - Walter Studios
09-18 Los Angeles, CA - Echoplex
09-19 San Diego, CA - House of Blues
09-20 Las Vegas, NV - AREA15
09-22 Seattle, WA - The Showbox
09-24 San Francisco, CA - The Fillmore
09-25 Sacramento, CA - Ace of Spades
09-28 Denver, CO - Cervantes’ Masterpiece Ballroom
09-30 Minneapolis, MN - Varsity Theater
10-01 Milwaukee, WI - The Rave II
10-02 Chicago, IL - Avondale Music Hall
10-04 Detroit, MI - The Majestic Theatre
10-05 Toronto, Ontario - The Phoenix Concert Theatre
10-07 Montreal, Quebec - Club Soda
10-08 Philadelphia, PA - Brooklyn Bowl
10-09 New Haven, CT - Toad’s Place
